translations: 票价；[交]车费（fare 的复数）；照明弹
发生；进食；经历（fare 的三单形式）
（Fares）人名；（阿拉伯）法里斯；（意）法雷斯

phrs.translation: 公共汽车票钱；公车票；公车费率
飞机票价；航空费用；航空票价

sentences.sentence: Train fares are likely to remain unchanged.
sentences.translation: 火车票价很可能会保持不变。

sentences.sentence: Unrestricted fares will be increased as much as $80 one-way.
sentences.translation: 弹性票价将增加至高达单程$80。

sentences.sentence: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.translation: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。
